O.k. then let's get moving (clap my hands twice) we've
gotta find Cybertron.  By the way what kind of
government should they have, if the Predicons are
pretending to be at peace with the Maximals do they
share govenments, will we use battle cruisers when we
get there, does that mean I can start on one?

--- Rudra656@... wrote:
> All right.  I approved finding Vector Sigma on
> Cybertron.  Bringing it here 
> is something else entirely.  So Kyle, your post is
> void, however, LN although 
> it's nice to know why a ship is coming and where
> it's coming from it isn't 
> mandatory.  As for acting on my decision alone, the
> only reason I approved 
> his request is because, I think there's precedent
> for Vector Sigma and the 
> Organic Core, but I'll check that when I have some
> free time.
>
